attributes.action: For the rest of the UK to show Scotland we want them to remain in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
For those living in England, Wales and Northern Ireland who would like to show the Scots that we feel that what has made the United Kingdom a great power (out of all proportion to its size) for so long is that it is the United Kingdom, not England, that is respected throughout the world for the championing of democracy and justice and British values (not English values) of fair play and equality.

That united we stand but divided we may fall and we urge you passionately to stay with us for we have little other way to show it.

We ask the government to allow and promote this petition so as to provide ordinary people with a chance to show the strength of feeling in favour of the Union in the other counties that make up the unique United Kingdom that Scots, English, Welsh and Irish have contributed to for so long.
